name: quixotic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having or showing ideas that are different and unusual but not practical or likely to succeed: This is a vast, exciting and some say quixotic project.

Add to word list
Add to word list
literature having intentions or ideas that are admirable but not practical: Many think these attempts to make lawyers behave are quixotic.
